skillTree.name: Daemon of Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Powerful winds of magic constantly surround this daemon, greatly diminishing the effectiveness of magic attacks.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -25% for all spells
Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

effects.description:
Tzeentch corruption: +4
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Smoke & Mirrors"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Wild Heart"
Passive ability: "Roiling Skies"

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

effects.description: Spell: "The Amber Spear"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Spell: "Pit of Shades"
Overcast spell: "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Pit of Shades"
Overcast spell: "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Greater Arcane Conduit
skillTree.description: A strong mind is needed to channel the Winds of Magic. Those that have such a gift become arcane conduits - funnelling the magical tempests to their cause.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Greater Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates  lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Chaos
skillTree.description: Unnatural strength, an aura of dark menace, an unwavering devotion to the Chaos Gods  some warriors have undoubtedly been touched by the Ruinous Ones.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for all Warhounds, Forsaken, Warshrine and Aspiring Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for all Warhounds, Forsaken, Warshrine and Aspiring Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Warhounds, Forsaken, Warshrine and Aspiring Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for all Warhounds, Forsaken, Warshrine and Aspiring Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all Warhounds, Forsaken, Warshrine and Aspiring Champions units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Malevolent Ranger
skillTree.description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tribes of Chaos
skillTree.description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

effects.description:
Growth: +10
	(local province)

Growth: +20
	(local province)

Growth: +30
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Control: -4
	(local enemy province)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Control: -8
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Foetid Gallipot
skillTree.description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of ones minions.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +2%
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +6%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gathering of Might
skillTree.description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

effects.description:
Local recruitment capacity: +1
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +1
	(Lord's army)

Local recruitment capacity: +1
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +2
	(Lord's army)

Local recruitment capacity: +1
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%

Ambush defence chance: +16%
	(Lord's army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

Ambush defence chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8%
	(Lord's army)
Campaign movement range: +5%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1
	(Lord's army)
Spell: "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"

backgroundSkills.name: The Storm Chaser
backgroundSkills.description: "The Daemon lied with every breath. It could not help itself but to deceive and dismay, to riddle and ruin. The longer we conversed, the closer I drew to one singular ineluctable fact: I would gain no wisdom here."

effects.description: Immortal
Bound spell: "Urannon's Thunderbolt"

Upkeep: -40% for Chaos Spawn units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn units
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"
